name: Bruxish
author: tetsuya koizumi
flavor_text: It stuns its prey with psychokinesis and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellder’s shell is no match for it.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Follow the Wound
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
